case.title: Essential skills - Circular cutting
case.shortDescription: Precisely cut out the circle pattern from the gauze
case.detailedDescription: Precisely cut out the circle from the gauze or medium. Your objective is to cut out the circle as precisely and in as little time as possible.

selfAssessmentImage1.tip: Next time you can work on using your grasping hand to apply tension on the gauze for better cutting.

selfAssessmentImage2.tip: Nice job. Keep on practicing to improve your accuracy

selfAssessmentImage4.tip: Next time you can work on using your grasping hand to apply tension on the gauze for better cutting.

selfAssessment.question: Did you complete the task as described?
I used my dominant hand to cut
I used my non dominant hand to apply tension
I switched hands during the exercise
selfAssessment.tip: Itâ€™s ok to switch hands to complete the exercise, but your overall speed will be affected.

time.tip: Keep practicing to improve your time
